name: Sentinel (itch)
description:
I was thinking of making a video clip for my musical project Cava Grande. I decided to make a game instead.

You are no one, an alien being of unknown origin. Born into the void, drifting into the cosmos all alone. Will you survive?

The game lasts as long as the track "Sentinel" itself but there is still a factor of winning and losing with different endings.

You'll probably end up playing it many times to figure out how the game works which is the actual puzzle itself.

I don't want to spoil the game anymore, see for yourself. 

Enjoy and let me know what you think. Thank you.

https://soundcloud.com/cavagrande

https://www.facebook.com/santimagames/
